wikipedia_page.main: Rebecca Morelle is a British science journalist, currently global science correspondent for BBC News.

response: A book entitled Like a Hole in the Head (), which chronicles Noble's fight with cancer, was released in May 2005. A bursary was established by the BBC in Noble's memory; it will provide annual funding for a newly qualified journalist to work at the science and technology desk of the BBC News website for six months. The first recipient of this bursary was Rebecca Morelle.

link_mentions.page: List of current BBC newsreaders and reporters

response: *Rebecca Morelle, a British science journalist, currently global science correspondent for BBC News
